question: Please list horrors and thrillers with a $20M budget.
sql_query1:
SELECT Movies.Title 
FROM Movies
WHERE (Movies.Genre = "Horror" OR Movies.Genre = "Thriller") AND Movies.Budget = "20 million USD"
sql_query2:
SELECT Movies.Title 
FROM Movies
WHERE Movies.Genre = "Horror" OR Movies.Genre = "Thriller" AND Movies.Budget = "20 million USD"
interpretation1: List both horror and thriller films where either have a $20M budget.
interpretation2: Show all horror films, also show just the thrillers with a $20M budget.
